name.baseName: Rare Earth calcination;Neodymium(III) fluoride;In-situ leaching;neodymium iron boron (NdFeB) magnet
稀土煅烧;三氟化钕;原位浸出;钕铁硼(NdFeB)磁铁

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The process described involves the calcination of rare earth elements and extraction to produce Neodymium(III) fluoride, which is a precursor for creating neodymium iron boron (NdFeB) magnets. These magnets are widely utilized for various applications, including electronic devices, wind turbines, and electric motors due to their high magnetic strength.
本工艺涉及稀土元素的煅烧和提取过程，以生产三氟化钕，这是制造钕铁硼（NdFeB）磁铁的前体。这些磁铁因其高磁力而被广泛应用于各种设备，包括电子设备、风力涡轮机和电动机。

quantitativeReference.functionalUnitOrOther: The functional unit is a 1 kg NdFeB magnet

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: The basic process for Nd and Pr production is the same at all three deposits. It is identical for Nd and Pr except for the last solvent extraction step (SX5) where both are separated.
所有三个矿床生产 Nd 和 Pr 的基本过程都是相同的。 Nd 和 Pr 是相同的，除了最后的溶剂萃取步骤 (SX5)，其中两者被分离。
technology.technologicalApplicability: The process described involves the calcination of rare earth elements and extraction to produce Neodymium(III) fluoride, which is a precursor for creating neodymium iron boron (NdFeB) magnets. These magnets are widely utilized for various applications, including electronic devices, wind turbines, and electric motors due to their high magnetic strength.
本工艺涉及稀土元素的煅烧和提取过程，以生产三氟化钕，这是制造钕铁硼（NdFeB）磁铁的前体。这些磁铁因其高磁力而被广泛应用于各种设备，包括电子设备、风力涡轮机和电动机。

LCIMethodAndAllocation.deviationsFromLCIMethodApproaches: In this study, an allocation method based on the market prices of REOs28 is considered. To estimate uncertainties that refer to the allocation method, a mass-based allocation is undertaken as a sensitivity analysis

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Marx, J., Schreiber, A., Zapp, P. & Walachowicz, F. Comparative Life Cycle Assessment of NdFeB Permanent Magnet Production from Different Rare Earth Deposits. ACS Sustainable Chem. Eng. 6, 5858–5867 (2018).

Marx, J., Schreiber, A., Zapp, P. & Walachowicz, F. Comparative Life Cycle Assessment of NdFeB Permanent Magnet Production from Different Rare Earth Deposits. ACS Sustainable Chem. Eng. 6, 5858–5867 (2018).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing this LCA data set for NdFeB magnets, users should adhere to the defined functional unit of 1 kg NdFeB magnet. The allocation method based on market prices of rare earth oxides (REOs) should be taken into account when interpreting the results. For sensitivity analysis, users are advised to also consider the mass-based allocation approach to estimate uncertainties associated with the allocation method. It is pertinent that data set users consider the technological applicability specific to the regional source of production, i.e., Bayan Obo (China), and the unique process of separating Nd and Pr at the final solvent extraction step (SX5).
在使用此钕铁硼磁铁生命周期评估数据集时，用户应遵循定义的功能单元，即1公斤钕铁硼磁铁。在解释结果时，应考虑基于稀土氧化物（REO）市场价格的分配方法。为了估计与分配方法相关的不确定性，建议用户还应考虑基于质量的分配途径进行敏感性分析。数据集使用者必须考虑到具体的区域生产来源（即中国白云鄂博）和在最终溶剂提取步骤（SX5）中分离Nd和Pr的独特过程。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
